TextBox.Name: textBox11
TextBox.Value: ='Sales Profitability by Item Class and Cost Components (' + IIF([@Format]='D','Detailed','Summary') + ')'

Header.Name: groupHeaderSection2
Header.VisibleExpr: =([@Format] = 'D') And ((CustomFunc.GetFullItemClassDescription(Left([InventoryItem.ItemClassID], $SegmentDepth)) <> Null) And (Trim(Right(PadRight(Left([InventoryItem.ItemClassID], $SegmentDepth), $SegmentDepth, ' '), $SegmentLength)) <> '') Or ([InventoryItem.ItemClassID] = Null) And ($SegmentLength = $SegmentDepth))

Footer.Name: groupFooterSection2
Footer.VisibleExpr: =([@Format] = 'D') And ((CustomFunc.GetFullItemClassDescription(Left([InventoryItem.ItemClassID], $SegmentDepth)) <> Null) And (Trim(Right(PadRight(Left([InventoryItem.ItemClassID], $SegmentDepth), $SegmentDepth, ' '), $SegmentLength)) <> '') And (CStr($LastForcedClassFooter) <> [InventoryItem.ItemClassID]) Or ([InventoryItem.ItemClassID] = Null) And ($SegmentsLength = $SegmentDepth) Or ($ForcePrintClassFooter = 1))

Footer.Name: groupFooterSection4
Footer.VisibleExpr: =([@Format] = 'S') And ((CustomFunc.GetFullItemClassDescription(Left([InventoryItem.ItemClassID], $SegmentDepth)) <> Null) And (Trim(Right(PadRight(Left([InventoryItem.ItemClassID], $SegmentDepth), $SegmentDepth, ' '), $SegmentLength)) <> '') Or ([InventoryItem.ItemClassID] = Null) And ($SegmentsLength = $SegmentDepth))
